extension.name: Rich Snippets for jEvents
extension.author: JoomDev
extension.description:
Rich Snippets installed successfully.

This plugin enables you to set all the important & precise information to display in the Google Search results and enhance your listings. It improves the visibility of your events to a great extent. Plugin uses standard Schema.org markup and works with all major search engines.

Features

  • Add your Event name/Description in Google search results
  • Detailed Parameters (event name, alternate name, URL, and more)
  • Easy & Quick installation.
  • Instant support
